[OBJECTS]
# object_id  type	x	y	ani_set_id	extra_settings per object type
# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 22=Stair, 2 = Enemy1, 3 = Worm, 4 = Wheel_Left, 5 = Wheel_Middle, 6 = Wheel_right, 7= Vehicle, 8= Barrel, 9= Main character, 10= Spider, 11=Human
